title: Happy 🍰 Birthday 🎈to my blog | Happy 😃 1st Blog Anniversary 🍨🥗🍛🍧🥪🥒🍞🍟🍇
content: It’s celebration 🎉 time! I started my little food blog one year ago, as I decided to share this happiest moment with all of you who supported, encouraged, showered love 💗 towards my blog!  Thank you all for your best support and follows 👍  I would like to know drawbacks in my blog and I appreciate if you could give any valuable suggestions regarding posts, blog, theme, food or dishes. I wish you will support my blog forever 🙂 Many Thanks 🙏  Happy Cooking 😀 & Have a celebration 🎊 day  - Ramya
